scripts.test-docker-build: docker rm -f test-docker-backend && docker build -f Test.Dockerfile --target=backend --build-arg SERVICE=backend --build-arg ENV=production .
scripts.test-docker-run: docker run -d --name test-docker-backend -p 8080:3000 -e ENV=production -e PROTOCOL=https -e DOMAIN=alkimia.localhost -e SUBDOMAIN=server -v ./apps/backend:/app -v ./libs:/app/libs test-docker-backend tail -f /dev/null
scripts.test-docker-build_run: npm run test-docker-build && npm run test-docker-run
